Qeexo|Mountain View,CA/Pittsburgh,PA|Hiring Android Engineer FULL TIME, ONSITE, US Work Authorization is Required

Qeexo brings together a unique combination of expertise in human computer interaction, machine learning, and hardware integration to create revolutionary interactive solutions.

We are looking for somebody who loves writing good software, enjoys system-level programming, and is not afraid of modifying huge projects.

You can see more at our website:http://www.qeexo.com/jobs/
